verses.verse: And <S%G1684>getting<s%> into a <S%G4143>boat,<s%> He <S%G1276>crossed<s%> <S%G1276>over,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> to His <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4172>city.<s%>

And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> they were <S%G4374>bringing<s%> to Him a <S%G3885>paralytic,<s%> <S%G906>lying<s%> on a <S%G2825>bed;<s%> and <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3708>seeing<s%> their <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G3885>paralytic,<s%> <S%G2293>"Take<s%> <S%G2293>courage,<s%> My <S%G5043>son,<s%> your <S%G266>sins<s%> are <S%G863>forgiven.<s%>"
And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> [fellow] <S%G987>blasphemes.<s%>"
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3609>knowing<s%> their <S%G1761>thoughts<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2444>"Why<s%> are you <S%G1760>thinking<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> in your <S%G2588>hearts<s%>?
"For <S%G5101>which<s%> is <S%G2123>easier,<s%> to <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'Your <S%G266>sins<s%> are <S%G863>forgiven,<s%>' <S%G2228>or<s%> to <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1453>'Rise,<s%> and <S%G4043>walk<s%>'?

"But in <S%G2443>order<s%> that you may <S%G3609>know<s%> that the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> on <S%G1093>earth<s%> to <S%G863>forgive<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%>" – <S%G5119>then<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G3885>paralytic<s%> – <S%G1453>"Rise,<s%> <S%G142>take<s%> up your <S%G2825>bed,<s%> and <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G3624>home.<s%>"
And he <S%G1453>rose,<s%> and <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G3624>home.<s%>

But when the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> [this,] they were <S%G5399>filled<s%> with <S%G5399>awe,<s%> and <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> who had <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> to <S%G444>men.<s%>

And as <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3855>passed<s%> on from <S%G1564>there,<s%> He <S%G3708>saw<s%> a <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G3102>Matthew,<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> in the <S%G5058>tax<s%> <S%G5058>office;<s%> and He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G190>"Follow<s%> Me!" And he <S%G450>rose,<s%> and <S%G190>followed<s%> Him.

And it <S%G1096>happened<s%> that as He was <S%G345>reclining<s%> [at the table] in the <S%G3614>house,<s%> <S%G2400>behold<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> tax-gatherers and <S%G268>sinners<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and were <S%G4873>dining<s%> with <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> and His <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>

And when the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> [this,] they <S%G3004>said<s%> to His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G1223>"Why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> is your <S%G1320>Teacher<s%> <S%G2068>eating<s%> with the tax-gatherers and <S%G268>sinners<s%>?"

But when He <S%G191>heard<s%> this, He <S%G3004>said,<s%> "[It is] not <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G2480>healthy<s%> who <S%G5532>need<s%> a <S%G2395>physician,<s%> but <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G2560>sick.<s%>

"But <S%G4198>go<s%> and <S%G3129>learn<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> [this] <S%G1510>means,<s%> 'I <S%G2309>desire<s%> <S%G1656>compassion,<s%> and not <S%G2378>sacrifice,<s%>' for I did not <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G2564>call<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> but <S%G268>sinners.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1223>"Why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> do we and the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3522>fast,<s%> but Your <S%G3101>disciples<s%> do not <S%G3522>fast<s%>?"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "The <S%G5207>attendants<s%> of the <S%G3567>bridegroom<s%> <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3996>mourn<s%> as <S%G3745>long<s%> as the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%> is with them, can they? But the <S%G2250>days<s%> will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%> is <S%G522>taken<s%> <S%G522>away<s%> from them, and <S%G5119>then<s%> they will <S%G3522>fast.<s%>

"But <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1911>puts<s%> a <S%G1915>patch<s%> of <S%G46>unshrunk<s%> <S%G4470>cloth<s%> on an <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G2440>garment;<s%> for the <S%G4138>patch<s%> <S%G142>pulls<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> from the <S%G2440>garment,<s%> and a <S%G5501>worse<s%> <S%G4978>tear<s%> <S%G1096>results.<s%>

<S%G3761>"Nor<s%> do [men] <S%G906>put<s%> <S%G3501>new<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> into <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G779>wineskins;<s%> <S%G7507>otherwise<s%> the <S%G779>wineskins<s%> <S%G4486>burst,<s%> and the <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G1632>pours<s%> out, and the <S%G779>wineskins<s%> are <S%G622>ruined;<s%> but they <S%G906>put<s%> <S%G3501>new<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> into <S%G2537>fresh<s%> <S%G779>wineskins,<s%> and <S%G297>both<s%> are <S%G4933>preserved.<s%>"

While He was <S%G2980>saying<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> to them, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there <S%G4334>came<s%> a [synagogue] <S%G758>official,<s%> and <S%G4352>bowed<s%> <S%G4352>down<s%> <S%G4352>before<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "My <S%G2364>daughter<s%> has <S%G737>just<s%> <S%G5053>died;<s%> but <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G2007>lay<s%> Your <S%G5495>hand<s%> on her, and she will <S%G2198>live.<s%>"
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1453>rose<s%> and [began] to <S%G190>follow<s%> him, and [so did] His <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>

And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> who had been <S%G131>suffering<s%> from a <S%G131>hemorrhage<s%> for <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2094>years,<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> up <S%G3693>behind<s%> Him and <S%G681>touched<s%> the <S%G2899>fringe<s%> of His <S%G2440>cloak;<s%>
for she was <S%G3004>saying<s%> to <S%G1438>herself,<s%> <S%G1437>"If<s%> I <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G681>touch<s%> His <S%G2440>garment,<s%> I shall <S%G4982>get<s%> <S%G4982>well.<s%>"

But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4762>turning<s%> and <S%G3708>seeing<s%> her <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2364>"Daughter,<s%> <S%G2293>take<s%> <S%G2293>courage;<s%> your <S%G4102>faith<s%> has <S%G4982>made<s%> you <S%G4982>well.<s%>" And at <S%G1565>once<s%> <S%G5610><s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> was <S%G4982>made<s%> <S%G4982>well.<s%>
And when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> into the official's <S%G3614>house,<s%> and <S%G3708>saw<s%> the flute-players, and the <S%G3793>crowd<s%> in <S%G2350>noisy<s%> <S%G2350>disorder,<s%>
He [began] to <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G402>"Depart;<s%> for the <S%G2877>girl<s%> has not <S%G599>died,<s%> but is <S%G2518>asleep.<s%>" And they [began] <S%G2606>laughing<s%> at Him.
But <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G3793>crowd<s%> had been <S%G1544>put<s%> out, He <S%G1525>entered<s%> and <S%G2902>took<s%> her by the <S%G5495>hand;<s%> and the <S%G2877>girl<s%> <S%G1453>arose.<s%>
And <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5345>news<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out into <S%G3650>all<s%> that <S%G1093>land.<s%>

And as <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3855>passed<s%> on from <S%G1564>there,<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G5185>men<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> Him, <S%G2896>crying<s%> out, and <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1653>"Have<s%> <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on us, <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G7035>David!<s%>"

And after He had <S%G2064>come<s%> into the <S%G3614>house,<s%> the <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G5185>men<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> up to Him, and <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "Do you <S%G4100>believe<s%> that I <S%G1410>am<s%> <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%>?" They <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G3483>"Yes,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>"
<S%G5119>Then<s%> He <S%G681>touched<s%> their <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Be it <S%G1096>done<s%> to you <S%G2596>according<s%> to your <S%G4102>faith.<s%>"

And their <S%G3788>eyes<s%> were <S%G455>opened.<s%> And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1690>sternly<s%> <S%G1690>warned<s%> them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3708>"See<s%> [here,] let <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>one<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> [about this]!"
But they <S%G1831>went<s%> out, and <S%G1310>spread<s%> the <S%G1310>news<s%> about Him in <S%G3650>all<s%> that <S%G1093>land.<s%>
And as they were <S%G1831>going<s%> out, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G2974>dumb<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> demon-possessed, was <S%G4374>brought<s%> to Him.

And after the <S%G1140>demon<s%> was <S%G1544>cast<s%> out, the <S%G2974>dumb<s%> <S%G2974>man<s%> <S%G2980>spoke;<s%> and the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G2296>marveled,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3763>"Nothing<s%> <S%G3779>like<s%> <S%G3779>this<s%> was <S%G3763>ever<s%> <S%G5316>seen<s%> in <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>"
But the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "He <S%G1544>casts<s%> out the <S%G1140>demons<s%> by the <S%G758>ruler<s%> of the <S%G1140>demons.<s%>"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G4013>going<s%> <S%G4013>about<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4172>cities<s%> and the <S%G2968>villages,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> in their <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%> and <S%G2784>proclaiming<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> and <S%G2323>healing<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3956>kind<s%> of <S%G3554>disease<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3956>kind<s%> of <S%G3119>sickness.<s%>

And <S%G3708>seeing<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes,<s%> He <S%G4697>felt<s%> <S%G4697>compassion<s%> for them, <S%G3754>because<s%> they were <S%G4660>distressed<s%> and <S%G4496>downcast<s%> <S%G5616>like<s%> <S%G4263>sheep<s%> <S%G3361>without<s%> <S%G2192><s%> a <S%G4166>shepherd.<s%>
<S%G5119>Then<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> "The <S%G2326>harvest<s%> is <S%G4183>plentiful,<s%> but the <S%G2040>workers<s%> are <S%G3641>few.<s%>
<S%G3767>"Therefore<s%> <S%G1189>beseech<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of the <S%G2326>harvest<s%> to <S%G1544>send<s%> out <S%G2040>workers<s%> into His <S%G2326>harvest.<s%>"
